ISSUE.TITLE: Escape redirect URL when recorded by logger
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Proposed Changes When logging the redirect URL passed by a request, ensure that it is escaped. ### Justification This will avoid potential formatting & security issues.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Fixes #19230: Allow label reuse when creating multiple components from a pattern (#19261)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Fixes #19265: Strip linebreaks from URLs for logging
Fixes #19265: Strip linebreaks from URLs for logging
